b'@Burt_Burton Cig volumes have been declining since 1980, so I\xe2\x80\x99m not worried. Surprisingly tho, nicotine product usage is actually accelerating. 1 in 3 high school seniors have used a vape in the last 30 days. And 90% of the closed pod vape ecosystem is split between $BTI and $MO (juul & vype)'

I really like $MO and $BTI. Currently paying dividends from 7-9%. $MO in particular has raised its dividend every year for over a decade. Additionally, they have both taken a beating and have significant upside in the marijuana industry. Buy the blood.'
